bower-files

Project Page

Bower is a package manager for front-end packages, such as React, AngularJS, and Bootstrap. The problem arises when you start piling on more and more dependencies. Bootstrap requires jQuery to be loaded before it can be loaded. This requires you to build in custom logic to your build process, and everytime you add a new dependency, you have to hack your build process again.

bower-files aims to automate front-end dependency management. It will ready your bower configuration file, and give you the list of packages in the order they need to be in based on their dependencies. It also splits them up by extension, so you can split up styling and script dependencies.

This project easily saves me hours on each project I use it for, plus it makes the project easier to manage and update.
